Package com.fdmgroup.ElevatorProject

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.fdmgroup.ElevatorProject.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Manages the queue of people and passes requests to Elevators, handling Elevator assignments.

  • Method Details

    • getPeopleQueue

      public ArrayList<Person> getPeopleQueue()
      Returns:
      The ArrayList representing the queue of people.

    • addPersonToQueue

      public void addPersonToQueue(Person person) throws InterruptedException
      Adds a Person to the queue of people waiting for an elevator.
      Parameters:
      person - The Person object to be added to the peopleQueue list.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • assignElevator

      public void assignElevator() throws InterruptedException
      Assigns elevators to people in the queue, loading them into the elevators. Note that it will keep running until the peopleQueue list is empty.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If interrupted during elevator assignment.

    • FindElevatorWithPerson

      public Elevator FindElevatorWithPerson(Person person)
      Finds the elevator assigned to a specific Person.
      Parameters:
      person - The Person object to search for in elevators.
      Returns:
      The Elevator object containing the specified Person, or null if not found.
